About This Page

The "Compose New Message" page displays a form for composing a new private message to send to other friend(s). Messages can be sent to all site members, but we've constructed this template to list only users that are friends of the currently logged in user.

It makes use of the following functions:

  • Friends:Message_Form to display a form for the currently logged in user to send a message to their friend(s).
  • Friends:Mine to display an error message to the user if they have no friends.
